name: Colorboy
description:
Colorboy - The Legendary Console

How to Play
- 1, 2, 3, 4 - Change Color
- Mouse - Move Colorboy
- Avoid Same Color Obstacles

Meet Colorboy, he aims to get power, but are you ready to do what it takes?

Go through a world of color, and you have the power to shift color on demand, for you to avoid certain same-colored obstacles.... but not easy.

Colorboy is powerless, but  with your help he can obtain power, through finding the best consoles in universe, and then he can show what he is made of.

---

Solo Game by Derrick Mapagu( zpolt ) and Super Light Games

Made for Gamejam 73 Power, 5 Color Limitation, 2 Days around 30 hours
All code, art, music, etc was done from scratch in the jam.

There are easters eggs when you reach the "end"

1st Time Joining an Itch Game Jam also, so fun!

Enjoy!
